headline.print_headline: California Judge Throws Out Lawsuit Targeting Crude by Rail Facility
headline.main: California Judge Throws Out Lawsuit Targeting Crude by Rail Facility

lead_paragraph: A San Francisco Superior Court judge on Friday dismissed a lawsuit brought by environmental groups against Kinder Morgan’s Richmond, California, rail terminal, which quietly began unloading crude oil from trains this year, saying the plaintiffs waited too long to file their complaint.
